title: Soba noodles with toasted sesame seed sauce
ingredients: ['70g sesame seeds', '250g soba noodles or wholewheat spaghetti', '2 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '1 tablespoon sugar', '2 1/2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1 teaspoon toasted sesame oil', '5 spring onions, sliced', '275g broccoli florets']
